title: As Idalia nears, Florida officals warn of 'potentially widespread' gas contamination: What to know
author: The Associated Press
description: Florida officials are warning drivers of potential fuel contamination at dozens of gas stations on the Gulf Coast as residents brace for Idalia's landfall.
